title: Stranger Lover
overview: Liu Zixin's perfect marriage turned out to be a scam, her husband not only cheated but also had another purpose. She recruited private detective Zhang Xiuqi to take revenge on the scumbag, but Zhou Ping exposed that she had cheated on Zhang Xiuqi a year ago. The previous car accident caused her to partially lose her memory, but why did Zhang Xiuqi hide his identity and approach her?
